special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
When [i]Thuul’s Field Guide[/i] enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Drake creature token with flying.
{U} Chpt. VII
{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
{U} Chpt. IX
{T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
